sentence: The Gateway Pundit reported that Stephen Richer ran on exposing former Recorder Adrian Fontes’ “criminal” actions.
author: Jordan Conradson
title: EXCLUSIVE: Teneo Network, FDD, Koch, And Bill Kristol – AZ Attorney General Mark Brnovich Caught Hanging Out With #NeverTrumpers at Secret AZ Gathering

sentence: He told voters that former Maricopa County Recorder Adrian Fontes is a “criminal.” One year before his election, Richer wrote, This confidence has been further damaged by the fact that Fontes has not given a full accounting for his actions in the election, and his Office has failed to produce documents in response to the multiple records requests put forward by the Republican and its surrogate (me).
author: Jordan Conradson
title: EXCLUSIVE: Leaked Emails From Maricopa County Recorder Stephen Richer Reveal Voter Fraud Concerns Before 2020 Election

sentence: Democrat Adrian Fontes, who was the Maricopa County recorder during the 2020 election, accused Republican Brnovich of engaging in politics through the release of the report.
author: Randy DeSoto
title: AZ AG Releases Report Finding 'Fraud' and Problems With Handling of Over 100K Mail-in Ballots in Maricopa County
